mapper.select: select name from userTable where phone = #{phone}
select name from userTable where phone = #{phone} and licenseurl is not null and firmname is not null
mapper.insert: insert into userTable(phone, name, password, idno, licenseurl, firmname) values (#{phone}, #{name}, #{password}, #{idno}, #{licenseurl}, #{firmname})
mapper.select: select * from userTable where phone = #{phone} and password = #{password};
mapper.update: update userTable set password = #{newpassword} where phone = #{phone}
update userTable set licenseurl = #{newlicenseurl} where phone = #{phone}
update userTable set firmname = #{newfirmname} where phone = #{phone}
